13  package net.sf.oval.test.validator;
14  
15  import java.util.ArrayList;
16  import java.util.Collection;
17  import java.util.List;
18  
19  import javax.persistence.Basic;
20  import javax.persistence.Column;
21  import javax.persistence.Entity;
22  import javax.persistence.ManyToOne;
23  import javax.persistence.OneToMany;
24  import javax.persistence.OneToOne;
25  
26  import junit.framework.TestCase;
27  import net.sf.oval.ConstraintViolation;
28  import net.sf.oval.Validator;
29  import net.sf.oval.configuration.annotation.JPAAnnotationsConfigurer;
30  
31  /**
32   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
33   *
34   */
35  public class JPAAnnotationsConfigurerTest extends TestCase
36  {
37  	@Entity
38  	protected static class TestEntity
39  	{
40  		// -> @NotNull
41  		@Basic(optional = false)
42  		// -> @MaxLength(4)
43  		@Column(length = 4)
44  		public String code;
45  
46  		public String description;
47  
48  		// -> @NotNull & @AssertValid
49  		@ManyToOne(optional = false)
50  		public TestEntity ref1;
51  
52  		// -> @AssertValid
53  		@OneToOne(optional = true)
54  		public TestEntity ref2;
55  
56  		// -> @AssertValid
57  		@OneToMany
58  		public Collection<TestEntity> refs;
59  
60  		// -> @NotNull
61  		@Column(nullable = false)
62  		public String getDescription()
63  		{
64  			return description;
65  		}
66  	}
67  
68  	public void testJPAAnnotationsConfigurer()
69  	{
70  		Validator v = new Validator(new JPAAnnotationsConfigurer());
71  		List<ConstraintViolation> violations;
72  
73  		TestEntity entity;
74  
75  		{
76  			entity = new TestEntity();
77  
78  			violations = v.validate(entity);
79  			// code is null
80  			// description is null
81  			// ref1 is null
82  			assertEquals(3, violations.size());
83  			assertNull(violations.get(0).getInvalidValue());
84  			assertNull(violations.get(1).getInvalidValue());
85  			assertNull(violations.get(2).getInvalidValue());
86  		}
87  
88  		{
89  			entity.code = "";
90  			entity.description = "";
91  			entity.ref1 = new TestEntity();
92  
93  			violations = v.validate(entity);
94  			// ref1 is invalid
95  			assertEquals(1, violations.size());
96  		}
97  
98  		{
99  			entity.ref1.code = "";
100 			entity.ref1.description = "";
101 			entity.ref1.ref1 = entity;
102 
103 			violations = v.validate(entity);
104 			assertEquals(0, violations.size());
105 		}
106 
107 		{
108 			entity.ref2 = new TestEntity();
109 
110 			violations = v.validate(entity);
111 			// ref2 is invalid
112 			assertEquals(1, violations.size());
113 		}
114 
115 		{
116 			entity.ref2.code = "";
117 			entity.ref2.description = "";
118 			entity.ref2.ref1 = entity;
119 
120 			violations = v.validate(entity);
121 			assertEquals(0, violations.size());
122 		}
123 		
124 		// Column length test
125 		{
126 			entity.code = "12345";
127 			violations = v.validate(entity);
128 			// code is too long
129 			assertEquals(1, violations.size());
130 			
131 			entity.code = "";
132 		}
133 
134 
135 		// OneToMany test
136 		{
137 			entity.refs = new ArrayList<TestEntity>();
138 			TestEntity d = new TestEntity();
139 			entity.refs.add(d);
140 
141 			violations = v.validate(entity);
142 			assertEquals(1, violations.size());
143 
144 			d.code = "";
145 			d.description = "";
146 			d.ref1 = entity;
147 
148 			violations = v.validate(entity);
149 			assertEquals(0, violations.size());
150 		}
151 	}
152 }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
